name: Standard Drive
description: The standard and reliable turret drive system created by Deltatek Instruments for use on their M3 Stuart tanks, providing a balance of speed and control.

name: Standard Drive Mk.2
description: A further upgrade of the standard drive, found a huge success in all countries for it's enhanced speed at a marginal increase in weight.

name: Heavy Drive
description: A heavy-duty drive system developed in NII "Sever-S", providing a balance of speed and control.

name: Precision Drive
description: A specialized drive system designed for precision targeting created by Taniguchi Keiki, allowing for more accurate aiming and firing.
